title: Cannot open the client
body: Recently I click on my LOL icon, and it cannot open or it would stuck when it is loading, some of my friends have this problem as well. I hope the controllers can sort these kinds of issue out as soon as possible.

replies.body:
Hi,

Have a look at the [sticky thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom) which covers one of the most common causes of this kind of issue.

Quick test - are you able to load the page at http://support.riotgames.com ?

Cheers
Mindstar
I'm not having this problem. What OS are you on?
